iaik.pdf.pdfbox

Class DocumentTimestampPdfBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.pdf.pdfbox.PdfSignatureDetailsPdfBox
      • iaik.pdf.pdfbox.DocumentTimestampPdfBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentTimestamp, PdfSignatureDetails

    public class DocumentTimestampPdfBox
extends PdfSignatureDetailsPdfBox
implements DocumentTimestamp
    Implementation of the DocumentTimestamp interface using PdfBox.

                                             throws PdfSignatureException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: DocumentTimestamp
        Extract the timestamp token object from the document timestamp.
        Specified by:
        getDocumentTimeStamp in interface DocumentTimestamp
        Returns:
        the included timestamp token
        Throws:
        PdfSignatureException - if the timestamp can't be parsed
        java.io.IOException - if the timestamp can't be extracted

      • verifyDocumentTimestamp

        public void verifyDocumentTimestamp()
                             throws iaik.tsp.TspVerificationException,
                                    PdfSignatureException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: DocumentTimestamp
        Verify the included timestamp, i.e. verify the timestamp's signature value and that the timestamped data has not been changed (that the timestamped data equals the document's content).
        Specified by:
        verifyDocumentTimestamp in interface DocumentTimestamp
        Throws:
        iaik.tsp.TspVerificationException - if signature of timestamp token is invalid or timestamp can't be parsed
        PdfSignatureException - if the timestamp or the tsa certificate can't be extracted or if timestamped data has been changed
        java.io.IOException - if errors occur when reading the timestamp or timestamped data

      • verifyDocumentTimestamp

        public void verifyDocumentTimestamp(iaik.x509.X509Certificate tsa_certificate)
                             throws iaik.tsp.TspVerificationException,
                                    PdfSignatureException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: DocumentTimestamp
        Verify the included timestamp, i.e. verify the timestamp's signature value and that the timestamped data has not been changed (that the timestamped data equals the document's content).
        Specified by:
        verifyDocumentTimestamp in interface DocumentTimestamp
        Parameters:
        tsa_certificate - timestamp authority's certificate if not included in the timestamp
        Throws:
        iaik.tsp.TspVerificationException - if signature of timestamp token is invalid or timestamp can't be parsed
        PdfSignatureException - if the timestamp or the tsa certificate can't be extracted or if timestamped data has been changed
        java.io.IOException - if errors occur when reading the timestamp or timestamped data

        public PadesLTVParameters getLTVParams()
                                throws PdfSignatureException,
                                       java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: DocumentTimestamp
        Get the LTV data protected by this document timestamp (all ltv data up to timestamp creation)
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the LTV data
        Throws:
        PdfSignatureException - if some ltv data can't be parsed
        java.io.IOException - if some ltv data can't be read

      • getSigningTime

        public java.util.Calendar getSigningTime()
        Description copied from interface: PdfSignatureDetails
        Get the time of signature creation. If included the time given by the signature timestamp is used. Otherwise the time given in the PDF signature dictionary is returned.
        Specified by:
        getSigningTime in interface PdfSignatureDetails
        Returns:
        time of signature creation
